alert.note: Alert for Berrien (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 19 at 9:44AM EDT until June 19 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM EDT FOR COOK...SOUTHWESTERN BERRIEN...SOUTHEASTERN THOMAS...BROOKS... EASTERN COLQUITT AND SOUTHERN TIFT COUNTIES... At 943 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Adel to 10 miles south of Boston to near Monticello, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tifton, Adel, Quitman, Sparks, Boston, Omega, Lenox, Unionville, Phillipsburg, Morven, Berlin, Barwick, Cecil, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Grooverville, Eldorado, Massee, Greggs and Everett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
